svg.text: Panel (a): Real Refractive Index Shows negative values around 3 THz Negative index bandwidth: 2.88 THz
Panel (b): Absorption Coefficient Minimal losses across band Collision-dominated behavior
Panel (c): Phase Velocity Superluminal: vp up to 5.8c In negative index regions
Panel (d): Group Velocity Subluminal: vg < c everywhere Causality preserved
KEY RESULTS: 2.88 THz bandwidth, Max phase velocity 5.8c, Causality preserved
